[UE:Meta key="158f939b24f947058576e3483323a488" Scale="1"/]You earned a bonus gift for playing
the demo version to the end!
Dialog.Data_Transfer_Privilege_InGame:

[System:Color name="Warning" ]You'll return to the title screen after your

[UE:Meta key="7d45690ab3854a46b92edef58f01f7bb" Scale="1"/]Game progress is saved automatically.

[UE:Meta key="06a45c96ae30465c90d65908d6254448" Scale="1"/]If you leave now, you'll be escaping the planet
before collecting all missing ship parts.
Would you like to go back and restart
your last day to explore?

parts. Are you sure you're done exploring?
